byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS

lead_paragraph: The man who was fatally struck at the Port Authority Bus Terminal in Manhattan was identified as Samuel Rodriguez, 67, of Garrison, N.Y.

headline.main: Man Killed by Bus at Port Authority Terminal Is Identified

snippet: The man who was fatally struck at the Port Authority Bus Terminal in Manhattan was identified as Samuel Rodriguez, 67, of Garrison, N.Y.
